name: levee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a wall made of soil or other materials that is built next to a river to stop the river from overflowing (= coming out of a place because it is too full)
John Moore/Getty Images News/GettyImages

Add to word list
a wall made of land or other materials that is built to stop a river from overflowing (= flowing over its edges): Much of the city was under water after floods broke levees and forced the evacuation of 50,000 people.
